text.div:
Brucellosis (Tests for Brucella species by Culture and Identification Method)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    20734-0 Brucella sp identified in Tissue by Organism specific culture
    23594-5 Brucella sp identified in Semen by Organism specific culture
    24003-6 Brucella sp identified in Bone marrow by Organism specific culture
    44797-9 Brucella sp [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Organism specific culture
    551-2 Brucella sp identified in Blood by Organism specific culture
    552-0 Brucella sp identified in Unspecified specimen by Organism specific culture
